server.rest.controllers

Class SkillsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.rest.controllers.Controller
      • server.rest.controllers.SkillsController

  • @CrossOrigin(origins={"http://localhost:1234","http://theterminal.s3-website.us-west-2.amazonaws.com"})
 @RestController
public class SkillsController
extends Controller
    Controller for the Skills table in the database Provides all the REST endpoints related to Skills and stored SQL procedures

        @RequestMapping(value="/skills/view")
public SkillsResponse skills(@RequestParam(value="token")
                                                                    java.lang.String token)
        REST API link to get all skills data
        Parameters:
        token - The unique token of the User making the API call
        Returns:
        Response containing all the skills

public SkillsAddResponse addSkill(@RequestParam(value="token")

                                                                        @RequestParam(value="type")
                                                                        java.lang.String type)
        REST API Call to add a new skill
        Parameters:
        token - The unique token of the User making the API call
        name - The name of the Skill
        description - The description of the skill
        type - The type of the skill
        Returns:
        Response with the newly Added Skill or an error response

public SkillsEditResponse editSkill(@RequestParam(value="token")

                                                                           java.lang.String type)
        REST API link to update an existing skill
        Parameters:
        token - The unique token of the User making the API call
        id - The id of the skill to be updated
        name - The name of the skill
        description - The description of the skill
        type - The type of the skill
        Returns:
        Response containing the updated skill or an error response
